This document contains malformed content for testing edge cases:

It has unmatched quotes: "Hello world'
And special characters: @#$%^&*()

HTML entities: &lt;script&gt;alert('xss')&lt;/script&gt;

Very long line that goes on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and on and should be truncated according to the chunk size parameters

Null byte: \x00
Carriage return: \r
Form feed: \f
Vertical tab: \v
Backspace: \b

This document tests various edge cases that RAG system should handle gracefully.
